par mdzad/ /bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen/ /'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom
ldan sgra la bdag med mkhyen/ /ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /lam nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan ye shes bdag
med mkhyen/ /rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /sems can stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med/ /bdag
dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen/ /mos pa ston par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs/ /rtag dang mi rtag pa yang
mkhyen| |mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol/ /grags pa khams gsum kun tu gang / /brgya
byin mi yi dbang po dang / /klu rnams la sogs kun gyis mchod/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang / /skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston
par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa/ /'khor 'dir thams cad rab tu 'dus/ /sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang / /chos las sprul te gang byung ba/ /thams cad
bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis/ /gus pas thal mor sbyar lags/ /'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni/ /'od zer rgya rkyen 'di zhu lags/
de bzhin gshegs pas mi gnyid ni/ /stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na/ /khyim na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ba/ /thams cad las ni yang dag 'das/ /de bzhin
gshegs pas chos rnams ni/ /bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pas/ /bcom ldan dgongs pa rab mkhyen gyi/ /rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs ma yin/ /bcom
ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/ /ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'ong med/ /rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad med mchis/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// //bam
po gsum pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa/ /thugs rje chen po 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad/ /chos rje mchog gyur mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ci slad 'dzum
pa bstan mdzad ma shad du gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshim ma mchis/ /gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin cho ba rnams/ /mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa
dag kyang thogs/ /sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las/ /yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa/ /mnyam par
dga' mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod na/ /chos 'di thos nas dga' ba
rab bskyed pas/ /'dren pa rab mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas//
bya rgyal ngang pa bzhin du dbyangs rab snyan/ /sgra snyan tshad med rang gi dang gis 'byung / /ci slad 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du gsol/ /tshigs bcad bye ba tshad ma mchis
pa yis| |rjes mthun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod gyur cing / /ku tsi ra yi sgra skad mchog ldan pa/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ /'brug sgra zab mos
chos ni bstan pa'i sgras/ /'jig rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa/ /thugs rjes tshig rtsub yang na 'jam ston pa/ /ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye/ /skye
dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen/ /mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med par rtogs/ /'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog gyur pa/ /ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog
bkye| |mig gi byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang / /'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang / /smig rgyu chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum
mdzad lags/ /de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar du
yang / /thams cad de bzhin du ni rig par bgyi/ /rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig sku/ /mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /sku la 'khrul 'khor mi
mnga' g.yo mdzad pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rting pa yangs/ /phyal gyi mtshan ma mi gda' seng+ge 'dra/ /
lte ba shin tu zab cing rked rgyas pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs/ /ba spu re re kha dog mthon mthing
ldan| |g.yas su 'khyil zhing spos kyi ngad ldang ba/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa/ /dper
na n+ya gro d+ha yi shing rgyal bzhin/ /yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad/ /dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa
sdug la mdzes/ /gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'/ /zhing ni brgya stong dpag med rgyu bar mdzad/ /sems can log dang yang dag lam ston
mdzad| |tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra/ /ljags mtshan srid ring zhal ni kun tu khebs/ /'gram pa seng+ge'i 'dra zhing shangs kyang mtho/ /thams cad thabs
dang rnam dag thugs las skyes/ /ut+pa la yi gsung ni zhal nas 'byung / /tsan+dan dri dag sku ni kun tu khyab/ /sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas na/ /rnam dag
mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil rtag tu mnyam/ /sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur/ /gom pa seng+ge glang po che 'dra bas/ /
'jig rten thams cad las ni yang dag 'das/ /'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis legs par brgyan/ /khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rtag tu gsal/ /dge ba
dag gis skye rgu phan 'dogs pas/ /gang gis mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye/ /sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad/ /
sngon ni dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas/ /mtshan gyi bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes lags/ /gzugs sku yongs rdzogs dpe zla yong ma mchis/ /zhal mtshan rab
mdzes shin tu khyad par 'phags/ /rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /byin pa ri dwags e na ya dang
'dra| |sku dbyibs mi sgu seng+ge ji lta bzhin/ /'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du
gsol| |cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'/ /phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das/ /mi yi seng+ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags/ /ci slad 'dzum
pa bstan mdzad pa shad du gsol/ /sku la 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing / /kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal zhing / /rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad//
mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad/ /rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis/ /de 'dra'i chos ni sgrub par 'gyur ma lags/ /gang gis mthar lta rnams ni rab
spangs na/ /bcom ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur/ /lha rnga 'brug sgra'i gsung ni kun grags shing / /ka lan+da ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal/ /lha yi glu sgra
brgya stong mang ldan pa/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ /'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas/ /'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun
yang bcad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsung pa/ /de kun zab cing ngo mtshar chos lags so/ /khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye
pas| |sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad/ /spyan mchog dag ni mthon mthing kha dog 'dra/ /gtsug tor mtshan ni mkha' yi lhas mi mthong / /tshems dkar
gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan/ /dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs/ /dge ba'i 'phrin las tshad med dag las skyes/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad
bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku/ /kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing / /'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye ba/ /
ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso/ /sems can yang dag bsam pa thugs su chud/ /thogs pa ma
mchis spobs pa mchog brnyes pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas/ /rig pa gsum dang mngon
shes dug phun tshogs/ /rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med
snyed| |bcom ldan brgya stong snyed la mchod pa mdzad/ /de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras chab ni mi 'tshal ba/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan
sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed/ /ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab zhugs pas/ /mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i mtha' mkhyen
na| |ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus/ /'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen/ /rnam dag mkhyen
pa thogs med bsam mi khyab/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyag gser gyi
kha dog lta bu brkyangs te zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ /gzhon nu shin tu legs par nyon/ /ngas
ni deng 'dir byang chub chos/ /'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo/ /khyod la shin tu yongs gtad kyi/ /ma 'ongs tha ma dus ngan tshe/ /chos ni rnam par 'jig pas na/ /
khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni/ /rab tu phye nas bshad par gyis/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis/ /ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /shin tu zab cing gya
nom pa'i/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di dag la/ /gang mos gang ni mi mos pa/ /thams cad kun kyang gzigs shing mkhyen/ /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /byang
chub lam ni rab tshol ba/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing / /mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig dad pa rab 'jig cing / /'du 'dzi la ni mos gyur ngang / /nyin
mtshan gnyid la gang dga' ba/ /mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa dag la ni/ /rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la/ /
mos pa dag ni mi skye ba/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /dad pas byin pa chud zos 'gyur/ /'dus byas rnams ni chos dag la/ /nyes dmigs mang bar thos kyang ni/ /
'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas/ /'jig pa dag ni mi skye ba/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur/ /chos gos dag ni bgos
gyur kyang / /de la shes rab ci yang med/ /thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi/ /yang dag dka' ni gang yin pa/ /shes pa med pas thos gyur na/ /yid ches
len par mi 'gyur te/ /skyes bu blun po de dag dang / /lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag /gal te thos par gyur nas kyang / /rab tu
dga' zhing mos pa yi/ /sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni/ /ngas ni rab tu smod par byed/ /ma lus thob par gyur mod kyi/ /de ni
don med chud zos yin/ /gal te shin tu zab pa'i chos/ /'di dag thos par gyur na ni/ /rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/ /sems
ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas phrad pas na/ /gdon mi za ba kho nar ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /skyes
bu blun po gang dag cig /lta ba ngan pas rab rmas nas/ /shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa/ /byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mi dge ba'i/ /
bshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas/ /blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni/ /brten cing gus pa bskyed par bya/ /'jig rten dag ni thams cad na/ /nyes dmigs
tshad med gang yod pa/ /sems can ngan song gsum por ni/ /rtag tu byang bar gang byed pa/ /thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas
ni| |nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing / /rang dbang dag ni thob mi 'gyur/ /yang dag chos ni spong byed cing / /chos ma yin pa spyod par byed/ /de lta bas na rmongs
pa yi/ /skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya/ /ji ltar kha lo sgyur ba yi/ /rang gi srog shing bcag pa bzhin/ /mi dge'i las ni byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal
bar skye bar 'gyur/ /kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni/ /rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa/ /ji ltar sta re rno thogs nas/ /rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra/ /chos rnams rgyu dang
rkyen dag gis/ /byas pa'i las kyi rjes su ni/ /rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par/ /de ltar khong du ma chud pas/ /'jig rten drang srong la brten nas/ /dge ba'i grogs
po yin snyam sems/ /de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du/ /stong pa nyid ni gang sgom pa/ /'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas/ /chad par lta ba skyed par byed/ /lus ni snod
chag pa dang 'dra/ /sems kyang rjes su 'gag 'gyur zhes/ /phal cher kyal pa'i tshig dag la/ /mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing / /'di la mngon par zhen pas na/ /phan
pa'i don ni ci yang med/ /gal te sprul ni gdug pa yis/ /gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang / /nam yang skye rgu mang po rnams/ /ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi byed/ /blun po gang
zhig chos ston pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas/ /skye rgu mang po tshad med snyed/ /sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed/ /khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa/ /'di lta
bur ni blta bar gyis/ /deng 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni/ /zla 'od gzhon nu gang 'dug pa/ /'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das/ /tshad med
gang+gA'i klung bye snyed/ /mchod pa rim gro rab byas shing / /shin tu brtan par yongs bsgoms nas/ /bla med ye shes btsal bas
na| |srid pa dag ni thams cad la/ /sems kyis gnas pa ci yang med/ /mig gi skye mtha' gtan du ni/ /rnam par dag pa shes pas na/ /spros pa dag ni/
yongs spangs nas/ /mngon par shes pa ci yang med/ /sems can dag ni tshad med la/ /phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir/ /bla med 'od zer ston pa yi/ /mdo sde dag
ni ston par byed/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /chos 'di slob par mi nus pas/ /rnal 'byor sgom pa dag la ni/ /skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed/ /de lta bas na
blun po dag /thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas/ /de dag la ni bstan mi bya/ /de yi chos kyang mi bslab bo/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /rtsod pa'i smra la mos pas na//
rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la/ /nan tan sgrub par mi nus pas/ /skyes bu de dag rnams la ni/ /tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med/ /de lta bas na de dag la/ /
bsnyen bkur mi bya bsngags mi brjod/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /le lo snyoms las la gnas pas/ /rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi/ /mi dge'i las ni
spyod pas na/ /de la tshul khrims dag pa dang / /shes rab mang thos ci yang med/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul sems shing / /'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed/ /
khyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de/ /rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni/ /dman pa yin par rab tu ltos/ /khong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing / /byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la/ /
gal te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang / /lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur/ /bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas/ /yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur/ /blo gros dag dang mi
ldan pas/ /tshig gi bye brag 'byed mi nus/ /rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang / /de la mos pa skye mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /yun ring
po nas 'jig rten pa'i/ /tshig gi spros pa gang yin pa/ /thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin/ /so so'i skye bos 'di dag la/ /shin tu zhen cing chags pas na/ /ji srid
'tsho yi bar du yang / /rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims bsngags pa brjod byed kyang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgrub mi byed/ /kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang / /
lus kyis chos min spyod par byed/ /rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang / /rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni/ /kha dog bsgyur pa'i
gos gyon gsungs/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims can dag gis/ /gos 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang / /nga rgyal dang ni bag med pa'i/ /sems ni
rab tu 'phel bar byed/ /dad pas byin pa ci zos pa/ /thu lum 'bar ba mid pa 'dra/ /de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas/ /'dod pa lnga yi bde ba'ang med/ /gzhan yang sangs
rgyas chos dag la/ /mchog gi bde ba ma thob nas/ /spyod pa 'dren ma mos byed pa/ /mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur/ /yid kyi mos pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kyang ni dag
mi 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni/ /'khor mang nang du gnas gyur kyang / /dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag /seng+ge'i khyur ni zhugs pa bzhin/ /de ltar rab tu zhi ba
yi| |chos ni yang dag bstan byas kyang / /de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i don/ /rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas/ /'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags kyang / /khengs
pa'i sems ni skyed par byed/ /ston pa chen po mi dran pas/ /ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med/ /mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang / /yid bzhin nor bu thob pa
bzhin| |shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed pas/ /sems kyis cung zad gtong mi byed/ /'di lta bu yi ma rabs dag /khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni/ /spyod lam dag kyang
srung ba dang / /chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang / /cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na/ /yang dag shes rab ci yang med/ /kha spu dag ni breg gyur kyang / /sdig pa'i sems ni
mi spong zhing / /dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos/ /log lta rtag tu lhung gyur na/ /rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/ /de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /dge sbyong mngon
du bya ba yi/ /'bras bu dag kyang thob mi 'gyur/ /ma rig nyon mongs rnams kyang ni/ /rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing / /rang nyid dben
pa'i bsngags brjod kyang / /skyes bu blun po blo med pas/ /yang dag bgrod pa shes mi 'gyur/ /sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa/ /de dag thams cad mi dge yin/ /rnyed pa 'dod
pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgyu/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu dga'/ /lus ni ji ltar bde
snyam nas/ /rtag tu de lta'i dngos po dag /sgrub pa la ni mos par byed/ /dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu/ /lo ni mang por gnas byed kyang / /phyin log lta bar gyur pa'i phyir//
mya ngan 'das lam stor bas na/ /nam yang dge sbyong lam dag gis/ /'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur/ /yang dag lta ba rab nyams shing / /tshul khrims dag dang 'gal
byas pas/ /gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan pa/ /de la shin tu sred par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni/ /rtag tu sred pa skyed par
byed| |gal te grong khyer zhugs na yang / /nga rgyal mtshan ma ston byed cing / /lus kyi las ni mi srung bas/ /spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed/ /res 'ga' grong khyer
zhugs nas ni/ /rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du/ /dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag na/ /ri phug dag ni gang yod pa/ /khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis/ /de ni bdag gi gnas
yin te/ /mthon dman ran par lta ba dang / /'gro gom tshul la gnas so zhes/ /tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod de/ /dgra bcom pa yi rtags bstan pas/ /khyim
pa dag ni ji snyed pa/ /phan tshun du ni 'di skad du/ /dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa/ /yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer/ /res 'ga' dgon pa de dag na/ /gnas
par gyur pa de yi tshe/ /gal te gzhan dag 'ongs gyur na/ /'di lta bu ni ston par byed/ /bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu/ /nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce'am/ /
yang na rtswa 'jam bting nas ni/ /'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer/ /res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs gyur nas/ /khyim pas der ni phyin pa'i tshe/ /g.yo sgyus nan tan
'di skad du/ /bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed/ /'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam/ /rgyal po chom rkun la sogs pa'i/ /sna tshogs dag ni rjod par byed/ /res 'ga' chags pa'i
sems dag gis/ /bud med rnams kyi mdun dag tu/ /thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rang gi yon tan rjod par byed/ /bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /bsod nams
zhing ni chen por byed/ /bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas/ /rab tu byung nas lam sgom yin/ /btsun mo dang ni sras rnams kyang / /mtho ris skye bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /de
dag de skad thos nas ni/ /shin tu gus pa rab bskyed de/ /gos zas dang ni btung ba dag /sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par byed/ /btsun pas thugs rjes rab dgongs shing / /
bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer/ /ro zhim dag la zhen chags shing / /nyes dmigs rnams ni mi shes pas/ /bdud kyis glags kyang rnyed 'gyur te/ /rus sbal rgya
mos zin pa 'dra/ /dgon par gnas pa dag la yang / /rnyed pa dag gis snyems par byed/ /dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la/ /brnyes shing skur ba 'debs par byed/ /rnyed
dang grags pas sems rmongs pas/ /yang nas yang du zhen pa bskyed/ /lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu g.yo sgyu spyod pas na/ /lus dang ngag gi mi dge'i las//
yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed/ /gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yis/ /dang ba'i sems kyis mchod na yang / /le lo snyoms las dbang gis
ni| |de yi bsod nams 'bri bar byed/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /rtag tu mi dge'i 'dod bskyed pas/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la/ /rjes mthun bzod sems thob mi
'gyur| |gang dag nga yi bstan pa la/ /nyes dmigs de dag rab spangs nas/ /nan tan bag yod sgrub byed na/ /chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur/ /rnyed pa dang ni
mi rnyed dang / /bstod smad sdug bsngal bde la sogs/ /'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yo ba/ /chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur/ /lus la 'du shes mi gtsang dang / /
phung po rma yi 'du shes dang / /zas ni rma bskus 'du shes pa/ /chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur/ /gos bzang dag ni thob gyur kyang / /dregs pa dag ni mi skyed
cing / /ngo tsha dag pa'i phyir gyon pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /gzugs dang stobs ni mi snyems shing / /zas la chags pa med pa dang / /srog gnas
phyir ni gang za ba/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /sred pa rnams ni stong shes nas/ /'dod pa dag la blang dor med/ /rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa/ /chos 'di
thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /dpag tshad gcig 'das ri khrod du/ /gcig pu 'dug nas mnyam gzhag cing / /'dus byas bdag med gang rtogs pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka'
mi 'gyur/ /mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang / /mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing / /mi gtsang lam ni gang sgrub pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce
lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /dge slong dag ni tshad med
snyed| |brtson pa dang ni le lo can/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag /sgrub pa dang ni mi sgrub pa/ /yid ches pa dang yid mi ches/ /thams
cad de bzhin gshegs par gyis/ /dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag /mig zad lam ni gang yin pa/ /sgrub pa dang ni mi sgrub pa/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /gang zhig
byang chub rab mos shing / /zla gcig gnyis gsum 'das nas ni/ /dus gzhan phyir ni gang ldog pa/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur
nas| |mos pa'i sems ni gang skyed pa/ /gal te nyams par gyur na yang / /slar ni dang ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /bag med spong bar mi byed
na| |mdo 'di sangs rgyas bka' ma yin/ /de snyam du ni sems par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung
ba| |dang po dad pa skyes gyur kyang / /phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos la ma mos pa/ /mi bden grags dang rnyed pa tshol/ /grong khyer grong rdal rab rgyu zhing / /
gzungs rnams dang ni ting 'dzin dang / /kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod kyang / /de yis yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang / /'jig rten
las ni 'dod tshol ba/ /brjod pa dag ni rtogs byed pas/ /stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs/ /dran dang shes rab sems med pas/ /tshe tshad bar du don med 'das/ /
blun pos stong pa'i chos spong ba/ /de ni tshul khrims gegs byas pas/ /mnar med dag tu ltung bar gyur/ /nam yang mtho ris yongs mi skye/ /gang gis skad cig gcig
la ni| |mchod rten stong ni byas pa bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /tshig bzhi tshigs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags/ /me tog phreng ba brgya stong dag /sangs
rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /tshig bzhi tshigs bcad sems pa 'phags/ /gang gis rin chen mchod rten dag /gang+gA'i bye snyed
byas pa bas/ /gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/ /mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya/ /me tog gtor nas mchod pa byas/ /gang gis
tha na skad cig tsam/ /mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /chos gos 'bum phrag brgya mang po/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phul pa bas/ /gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/ /
mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dag 'phags/ /mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na/ /sangs rgyas
spyan ni thob par 'gyur/ /'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshe/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung / /nga ni drang srong khye 'ur gyur/ /me tog thogs nas mchod pa byas/ /shAkya
thub pa zhes bya ba/ /byang chub snying po la 'dug nas/ /mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes/ /nga la byang chub lung yang bstan/ /khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur/ /nga lung bstan
pa thos gyur nas/ /dga' zhing dang ba'i sems bskyed de/ /thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du/ /gal te bram ze khye'u ni/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas tshe/ /bdag ni
de yi grogs gyur nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang / /chos kyi mdo sde rab 'dzin cing / /srung bar shog ces smon lam btab/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de yis/ /'od
zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin de yi tshe/ /bram ze'i khye'u dang gzhon nu gnyis/ /legs par nyan cing yongs su bzung //
nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /me tog ut+pal dag gis ni/ /sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas/ /de tshe khyod kyang der 'dug ste/ /'di skad du ni smon lam btab/ /nga yi
bstan pa tha ma la/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bzung nas/ /rgya cher ston par shog ces smras/ /gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /zhe sdang sems ni mi bskyed par/ /gzung
'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa/ /de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ /khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /thos dka'i chos 'di rab bzung nas/ /sems can dag la don gyi
tshul| |rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya/ /ngas kyang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /yang dag chos ni nub pa na/ /'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/ /sems can dag la
rgya cher bstan/ /blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas/ /'di la skur pa 'debs par byed/ /ngas ni de skad thos gyur nas/ /zhe sdang dag ni skyed mi byed/ /nga ni rtag tu
bzod bsgoms nas/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed/ /bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na/ /mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis brgyan/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis
sangs rgyas sku/ /gya nom yongs su rdzogs gyur cig /gser gyi kha dog rnam dag 'phags/ /bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos/ /nga yi zhabs ni sa reg nas/ /zhing
ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang / /sems can rnams ni mi lhung ba/ /bzod pa'i stobs las thams cad skyed/ /nga yi spu khung gcig nas ni/ /'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/ /
thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /srin po shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /srog chags gzi brjid 'phrog byed pa/ /nga
la rtag tu gus pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa/ /sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la gus pa
yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag /'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa/ /thams
cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /klu yi rgyal po brgya stong dag /rab tu gdug cing 'jigs rung ba/ /sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang / /thams cad bzod mchog
stobs las byung / /srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas/ /me tog phreng ba brgya stong thogs/ /'ongs nas nga la mchod byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /
zhing ni brgya stong tshad med par/ /bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog
stobs las byung / /lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po/ /brgya stong dag ni 'dus gyur nas/ /me tog gtor nas nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /
gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa/ /bye ba brgya phrag drug cu rnams/ /'ongs nas nga la gang mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /gzhan yang klu yi
rgyal po ni/ /ma na pa ga la sogs pas/ /mu tig dmar pos nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /du mu ru dang shi khyi bi/ /brgya stong snyed ni 'dus
gyur nas/ /rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po/ /brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas/ /me tog spos
kyis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /sa chen 'jin pa klu yi rgyal/ /lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas/ /thal sbyar nga la gus pa yang / /thams
cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lus med sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs/ /bye ba phrag ni brgya stong rnams/ /dang ba'i sems kyis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod
mchog stobs las byung / /gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa/ /sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs
las byung / /sa mu ta dang rlung gi lha/ /brgya stong nam mkha' gang bar ni/ /spos kyis char bab nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lha yi 'khor ni brgya
stong dag/ lha yi me tog gtor mchod de/ /sred spangs sangs rgyas sten byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /khyod kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang / /sbyin dang
tshul khrims rab bsgrags nas/ /thams cad kun tu thos mdzad pa/ /bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos/ /phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang / /bden pa bzhi yi sgra dag
nas| |thams cad kun tu go mdzad pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' la mig zad mtha' dag dang / /rab zhi'i
sgra ni thos gyur te/ /skye ba'i mtha' yang de bzhin no/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen/ /de las skye dang 'gro 'ong med/ /de skad du ni thos
par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig zhi rtogs byed na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur| |nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs
kyis ni| |mkha' la mig zad mtha' zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs
kyis ni| |mkha' las mig zad rab zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las
mig skye mtha' zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig 'jug rab zhi na/ /
sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig ni skye zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las
skyes| |de skad du yang thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig dben rab zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni
thos par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/ /'dod chags
gti mug khong khro dang / /'chab dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang / /khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa/ /rgya cher bshad pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de
lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sang gi gdugs la
bdag de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mang po dang bcas par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci
gnang / de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la yang
phan gdags par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bstan las langs nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rab tu dga' bas rang gi khyim du song ste/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha
dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lto 'phye la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor dar gyi lding khang bres te/ lding khang de yang shin tu
mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun du khyab pa/ gser gyi tsong tsong dra bar bres pa/ nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba dpyangs pa/ seng+ge'i ba dan dang / gser gyi phreng ba lu gu rgyud can
'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i phreng ba'i phung po dag
gcal du bkram mo/ /me tog tsam+pa ka dang / a ti muk+ta la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba tshad med grangs med pa yang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams
cad dang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun du khyab par dpyangs shing rgyan du bres so/ /gzhan yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas rin po che'i spos phyi li
ka dang / du ma tsa dang / tsan+dan dang / gur gum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang
mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar to/ /gzhan yang spos kyi chus lam srang rnams kun du khyab par chag chag btab bo/ /sa gzhi kun du me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram
mo| |de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / sgra gcan 'dzin gyi bu mo grangs med tshad med pa yang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi
rgyu mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir der 'ongs nas grong khyer chen po de'i khyad par du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan to/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas grong
khyer de kun du khyab par brgyan zhing yongs su dag pa dang / gdugs tshod la bab par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can
rnams la sman par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer chen por gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas sgo'i them
pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa yang
rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag gis mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni/ bde ba thob par gyur/ /'on pa rnams ni/ rna bas sgra thos par
gyur| byad bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni/ byad bzhin bzang po thob par gyur/ nor med pa rnams ni/ nor dang ldan par gyur/ bu med pa rnams ni/ bu yod par gyur/ gos med pa rnams
ni| gos thob par gyur/ rin po che med pa rnams ni/ rin po che thob par gyur/ nye bshes med pa rnams ni/ nye bshes dang ldan par gyur/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis phongs pa
rnams ni/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhan yang ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ne tso dang / rma bya dang / ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de
bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa phyung ste/ gang gis sgra de thos pa yang
yid shin tu bde bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam+pa ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul pas sems can
brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su dag pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so/ /gzhan
yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob pa brgya stong du ma mu tig dmar po dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor
to| |lha ma yin mang po dang / gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i steng du khebs par g.yogs so/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsan+dan gyi ljon shing dang / gser gyi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i snod dang / gos la
sogs pa'i ljon shing brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ me tog dang lo ma phun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsod nams
kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon par grub pa/ rlung gi ngad langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams kun du khyab
gang bar mngon par sprul to/ /sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus gcig tu me tog thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /de bzhin du sems
can dang / sems can ma yin pa tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go /gang dag ci dang ci smon pa de dag kyang
rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad
nam mkha' las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la/ tshigs su
bcad pa brgya stong du mas kyang chos rnams yang dag par bstan par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod
chags zad mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags
par gyur/ /'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs
pa'i tshe| |mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags mtha' ni stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan
'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags rab zhi stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par
'gyur| |bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid
rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs
pa| |yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags skye
med stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags
par gyur/ /'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab ser sna/ /g.yo sgyu khengs dang
nga rgyal mya ngan dang / /sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa lam sems can/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med dag dang ni/ /skyes pa gso ba dag dang dbang po drug /yul drug 'byung chen
bzhi yi dngos po dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams rnams dang / /'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de bzhin/ /chos rje dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas na/ /sems can
thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten kun kyang thos gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thag la gnas par mos/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe
mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan sbyin stobs dag la rab mos pas/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong
khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos pas/ /tshul khrims stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur//
bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang
chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan brtson 'grus
dag la rab mos pas/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur//
bcom ldan bsam gtan dag la rab mos pas/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las
sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mos pas/ /shes rab stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan gnas
shes stobs/ /thabs dang gzungs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs/ /las dang rten 'byung yan lag dad dang thos/ /gtong dang mthun pa'i stobs dang rab zhi stobs/ /rab
dul yang dag mtha' dang dben mkhas stobs/ /'jigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs la mos dang / /byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod 'tshe med/ /stong dang mtshan
ma med sogs kyang de bzhin/ /stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha yi gtso/ /yon tan grags pa dpe zla ma mchis pa/ /grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni
bzhag pa'i tshe/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad/ /sngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrubs pas/ /lha yi dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad/ /'jig rten
thams cad kyis ni rab tu bkur/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag tshe/ /grong khyer sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos//
bcom ldan rnam dag 'od zer mthong bas na/ /ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med/ /bcom ldan grong gshegs phan pa cher mdzad pas/ /lha mi'i 'khor rnams sems
ni dga' bar gyur/ /sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na/ /bcom ldan shin tu bde zhes bsngags par gyur/ /bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor lo sa bzhag tshe/ /rnam dag
'od zer kun gsal ngo mtshar gyur/ /rta ni cang shes grong khyer sgra snyan phyung / /bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' las rab tu dga'/ /gzhan yang rab dad bud med mang po yi/ /lag dang
rkang gi gdub 'khor phreng ba dang / /de bzhin rin chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las/ /ma dkrol bar yang rang las sgra snyan byung / /so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing //
skad mthun bkra shis mchog gi bsngags pa brjod/ /'on long dbang po ma tshang dbang po thob/ /thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang / /bcom ldan grong khyer
gshegs tshe kun dga' bas/ /lha mis me tog kun gtor mchod pa byas/ /mkha' las kun tu sgra snyan byung bas na/ /lha tshogs tshad med rab tu
dga' bar gyur/ /gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dang / /smyos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod/ /bud med gang sbrum mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa/ /'od
zer byin gyis bde ba thob par gyur/ /skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel bcas la/ /dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas/ /thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems
bskyed de/ /thub mchog zhabs la spyi btud phyag byas nas/ /kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam mchog tshol/ /kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos tshol/ /bcom
ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pas na/ /bcom ldan zhal du blta zhing rang nyid dga'/ /bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa yi spyod rtogs pas/ /'jig rten rjes
mthun phan pa rab tu mdzad/ /chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin/ /rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang / /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i
tshe| |mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung / /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra
ni 'di skad byung / /gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas yid ches mi 'jigs thob/ /mig zad
mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /chos la yid ches mi 'jigs thob/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin tu dang ba
rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs thob/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig
zad mtha' sred pa/ /tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i
'dod chags spong bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur//
mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /
gti mug rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /byang chub ye shes dag la gnas/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chad/ /
mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'/ /'jug pa dang ni rab dben dang / /yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang / /mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang / /'di la sogs
pa'i sgo rnams kyang / /thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu
'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig
mig gi mtha' sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa/ /de ni rtag
tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig dben rab sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom
med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig mi skye sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu
'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig med la sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig
mig zhi la sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya
nas| |sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mig skye dpag med gang bskyed pa/ /ye shes dpag med skyed par byed/ /ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
phyir| |chos 'di bstan pa'ang de bzhin no/ /mig zad dpag med gang shes pa/ /mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur/ /de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs
med thob/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs
pa'i tshe| /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mkha' las chos bshad sgra thos nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan the tshom med/ /kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /sangs
rgyas ye shes 'jigs mi byed/ /gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /sangs rgyas yon tan stor ma gyur/ /kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /bla med ye
shes tshol byed cing / /ma 'dres chos ni sgrub pa dang / /nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed/ /byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /bsam gtan bde la mos pas na/ /
mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyed nas/ /dge sbyong 'bras bu thob snyam sems/ /byis pa gsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /mi zad mtha' yi shes med
na| |bskal pa brgya stong sgom byed kyang / /de la rnam grol ci yang med/ /skye ba len pa thams cad ni/ /de la zhen chags skyed par byed/ /gal te skye nyid stong rig
na| |mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs kyang / /mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na/ /bskal pa brgya stong lon kyang ni/ /bsam
gtan yongs su dag mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyer bsdogs thob gyur kyang / /zad mtha' shes pa thob mi 'gyur/ /zad pa thob pa ma shes phyir/ /zag pa thob la rtag tu
spyod| |gang zhig 'du shes zhen byed pa/ /'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med/ /'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu 'du shes zag la spyod/ /gang zhig 'jig rten
zhen chags pa/ /'jig rten zad mtha' shes pa med/ /'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod/ /gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas/ /
sems zad mtha' yi shes pa med/ /sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod/ /gang zhig zag bcas chos la gnas/ /chos zad mtha' yi shes pa
med| |chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu zad bcas chos la spyod/ /sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /
yang dag sbyangs la gnas ma yin/ /kha dog bsgyur gos bgos gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin/ /ya
rabs rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin/ /'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang / /mig zad
mtha' yi shes med na/ /myur du ngan 'gror lhung 'gyur te/ /'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus/ /sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa
ni ma shes phyir/ /sgra yi rig pa rtogs ma yin/ /bzo rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /de ni bzo la mkhas ma yin//
dri ba mang la mkhas gyur cing / /yi ge gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /de ni don mthun bshad ma yin/ /mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang / /
gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /chos ni rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /brjod pa sna tshogs rgyang pan dang / /chos rnams rab tu shes gyur
kyang | /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /'khri shing stug bor lhung ba 'dra/ /sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur cing / /dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston kyang //
tshig 'bru yi ge sgra skad dang / /klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug dang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de dag rnams ni shes med yin/ /bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang / /
tshig mkhan rmongs par byed pa dang / lus nyes ngal sos chos rnams dang / /mkhyud dpyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de dag rnams ni shes med
yin| |gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing / /yi ge 'bru gcig mi brjed kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /bshad pa de ni don med yin/ /de bzhin mig skye mtha'
dag dang / /mig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /
sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /sgra yi rig pa klog 'don cing / /de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de
ni nam yang dman pa yin/ /smrang gzhi dag ni 'don byed cing / /gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de ni nam yang dman pa
yin| |de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dag /mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin nyid du rig par gyis/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs
sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya'o/ /bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /
sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas/ /mig zad mtha' yi shes pa thob/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni tshad
med snyed/ /mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas/ /mig gi rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur/ /stong dang bdag med rab rtogs pas/ /thams cad rnam dag mig thob gyur/ /rna ba sna
lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang / nga rgyal khengs dang
g.yo sgyu nas/ /bag med pa yi bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /steng gi nam
mkha' dag las ni/ sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos/ /kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa yi/ /dpe zla med pa'i ming yang thos/ /kha cig zhe sdang 'jigs byed
cing | /'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing / /nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig 'jig
rtan dag la ni/ /rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren ming thos/ /kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas/ /'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas/ /
sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig bdud ni rab btul kyang / /'khon 'dzin med pa'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig gsung rab chos dag gis/ /rnam grol
bstan pa'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba/ /rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig mi yi gtso bo yis/ /'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos//
ming ni de dag thos gyur nas/ /thams cad rnam dag ming thob gyur/ /nam mkha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu/ /ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang / /thams cad gzhal du rung sred kyi/ /
sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thug mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad nges pa thob gyur na/ /chos sku mngon par grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na//
kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ /des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde dpag med
go gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig skye nges pa thob gyur na/ /chos sku mngon par grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos sku mchog ni
grub gyur na/ /kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ /des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde
dpag med go gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos dag nas/ /sgra rnams dang ni ming
gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar ba bya/ /de tshe sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos/ /rgya mtsho ri rnams kyang ni de bzhin no/ /lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po rnams/ /thams
cad rab tu dga' ba skyes par gyur/ /bdud dang bdud dpung g.yo sgyu rab bcom nas/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa sgrub par mos/ /lha rnams so so gzhal med khang zhugs
nas| |phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras/ /'dren pa deng ni 'jig rten byung bas na/ /lha mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad/ /sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang
gnas nas/ /dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du/ /'dren pa 'jig rten deng byung shin tu legs/ /'jig rten kun bde'i rgyu ni rab tu mdzad/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i lha
rnams de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren ba byung bas
'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /
'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags
brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /'thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan
sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyed na/ /bcom ldan bla med mkhyen pa nye bar
bgyi| |lha mi gtso mchog la ni brten nas su/ /sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer/ /dga' ldan lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang / /thams cad dga' nas
shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bye bar
ni| |spyod mchog khyad 'phags dpag med sngon bsgrubs nas/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan/ /'khor ba bsgral nas mya ngan 'das la bkod/ /'phrul dga'i
lha rnams de skad thos nas ni/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad
zer| |gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas
'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pa na/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad/ /bla med byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs nas/ /skye rgu
drangs nas pha rol 'jog ces zer/ /tshangs ris lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang / /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags
brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pas/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du/ /'dren pa byung
bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad/ /bdud dpung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer/ /srid pa'i rtse mo'i lha yi bar du yang / /sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos/ /
de bzhin sgra ni kun du grags pas na/ /lha ma yin dag 'grib cing lha rnams 'phel/ /bdud kyi khang pa dag ni yongs stongs shing / /lha
rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs stobs kyis log pa rab btul nas/ /byang chub chen po'i mchog ni myur du brnyes/ /de bzhin skad cig yud tsam
lha rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad thos gyur pas/ /'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin tu legs/ /rnam dag ming ni sems can sbyin zhes zer/ /bcom
ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /'dod pas yongs su gdungs pa rnams/ /mi gtsang sgom pa bshad thos pas/ /'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan
grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /zhe sdang dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas/ /zhe sdang zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer
gshegs pa'i tshe/ /gti mug dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas/ /gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs
pa'i tshe| /nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /phrag
dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /phrag dog spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /phrag dog zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /khong khro dag gis gdungs pa
rnams| |khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /khong khro zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /ser sna spangs
pa'i chos thos pas/ /ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /gang zhig dul ba'i spyod grub pa/ /dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas/ /mang du thos pa'i mtshor zhugs pas/ /kun 'dzin sgo
ni sgrub par byed/ /gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas/ /me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod/ /yon tan khyad par 'phags sgrub cing / /snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston/ /
gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas/ /bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas dang / /gdung rgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /sems can
'gro ba ji lta bar/ /rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad/ /mig dang rna ba sna lce lus/ /gzugs dang sgra dri la sogs dang / /bskum pa dang ni brkyang ba dang / /ston par mdzad pa
khyad par 'phags/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pa na/ /'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing / /gzugs ni mang po ston pa yang / /thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin/ /
snod dang snod min de rjes su/ /mi mthun chos ni ston mdzad pas/ /sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas/ /sangs rgyas mchod par ma byas shing //
dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la/ /sems can dmyal ba bshad par mdzad/ /gang zhig las la rmongs gyur cing / /lta la brten nas spros dga' ba/ /bcom ldan de
dag lta ba dang / /spros pa zhi ba'i sgra thos mdzad/ /gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid/ /nges pa nyid du stong pa dang / /'gro 'ong med cing mtshan med dang / /ci yang med pa'i
sgra yang thos/ /gzhan yang sems can brgya stong dag /mkha' las sha dang shes rab spyan/ /de bzhin chos kyi spyan bar du/ /yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos/ /bcom
ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra/ /rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra/ /ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur/ /sems can dag ni ji
snyed la| |de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas/ /ji ltar rjes mthun sgra skad kyis/ /yang dag chos ni bstan par mdzad/ /sems can la la gang zhig gis/ /sbyin dang tshul
khrims bzod sgrub mos/ /rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra ston/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /sems can dbang po ji lta
bzhin| |rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas/ /len 'dzin ston la dgod par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /bcings dang
grol dang nyi ring dang / /sa yi gnas skabs bye brag gi /mtshan nyid stong pa thos par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sa dang ye shes kyi/ /'od zer tshad med ston pa dang / /nyon mongs bag
chags spangs pa dang / /spangs min ston pa thos par gyur/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid/ /las dang 'bras bu mi mtshungs pas/ /skye len tha
dad thos par 'gyur/ /res 'ga' bud med mdun dag tu/ /bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprul nas/ /mkha' las skyo ston sgra bsgrags pas/ /gang thos 'dod chags sel bar mdzad//
shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin/ /shin tu dang ba skyes gyur pa/ /thugs rjes mos pa ji bzhin du/ /bla med chos ni ston par mdzad/ /mau dgal bu dang 'od srung dang / /ka pi na dang kun
dga' dang / /'od srung chen po dag dang ni/ /kun shes kau di n+ya la sogs/ /de dag mos pa ji bzhin du/ /nyan thos chos ston thos par 'gyur/ /lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin/ /
gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang / /be ro ka ni 'khor dang bcas/ /grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /gzungs sngags sgra ni thos par
gyur| /i di si/ bi di si/ i ra su/ i ra/ au na si/ ma na si/ u khyi/ a no khyi/ a khi tsa la maM naM ye/ di ra
ni sh+tha ni mi/ ta ka ni/ i mi man+t+ra/ ni ha ra/ a bu re/ bud+d+he/ ni re/ a khi tsa ra/ bi ya ki ri ya te/ a khi tsar pa ra mi te/ ka lA ba hi ni/ sarba bing+shi nir d+he bau na/ ba ra sha
sad te| sha sa ta/ pa ra sha sad ta/ ta ra sad ta/ b+hU mi/ Am b+ha ra/ li la b+ha na/ shiny+tsa tsid ta/ bi ba ma ti/ tsid ta a nan+ta/ o be ra ha ba mi ta b+hU mi/ na nam kA ni/ a ka
ni bi b+hi mid te/ sha ri bi sh+tha/ a ma la ni ma la/ bU li te na ra shi tsa/ ha ha ri/ ma ma lI/ b+ha ra Ni ti sh+tha/ tsak+Shu nir ha ra/ u d+ha ri ta ba tsi/ an+ta ri/ ku ta ri/ ke tu su ke tu su
pa ra ni| ka ra ni/ ku su ma ni yai/ ka ka ri/ ka kha ri/ u pa laM mU ri/ ti sh+tha da ra ni/ nA ga ni ra ha re/ pa ra lad te/ a te pa ra ya te/ an+ta ra b+han+d+he/ an+ta ra ta b+ha ti shi tsa/
ha si ri/ ma kha li/ I ni sam+b+ha re/ tish+tha sit+ta ra Ni/ ku b+hu lo tsa te/ gzhan yang rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /yul 'khor srung ni la sogs pas/ /khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs
med kyis/ /bden pa'i sngags tshig rab tu smras/ /tshad med sgra ni de dag kyang / /bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung / /rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas/ /bstan pa
dag kyang tshad med do/ /res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhing du/ /rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i stobs dag gis/ /'khor bskor sangs rgyas sku ston pa/ /da ltar mthong ba de bzhin no/ /bsam gyis
mi khyab zhing dag tu/ /sprul pa tshad med ston mdzad pa/ /bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang / /rgyal srid spangs nas rab byung dang / /byang chub snying por sangs rgyas nas/ /
brnyes pa'i chos dag rab dgongs te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad dang / /mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis/ /sna tshogs chos ni ston mdzad
pas| |sems can dag ni tshad med rnams/ /khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /byams chos
sgom pa bshad bstan nas/ /byams pa'i sems ni 'phel bar mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/ /bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bshad bstan
pas| |bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi 'phel bar mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/ /zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas/ /zhe sdang sems
ni spangs par gyur/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /rnam 'tshe'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas/ /rnam 'tshe'i sems ni spangs
par gyur/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /lha ma yin gyis yongs bskor nas/ /'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan te/ /bzod pa sgom
pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /nam mkha' lding gis yongs bskor nas/ /'gal byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te/ /'dum pa'i sems kyi
bsngags pa brjod/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /dga' ba'i tshig ni dpag med kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod
bstan| |de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /lto 'phye'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /mu stegs chos la smod mdzad cing / /bcom ldan gsung rab bsngags brjod bstan/ /
de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /'dre srin 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mchog /rgya cher bsngags pa bstan par mdzad/ /thugs rje
chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig zad mtha' bstan thos pas na/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul
bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig skye mtha' ni bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen po'i 'phrul bstan pas/ /
sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig gi mtha' ni bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin de ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong
snyed| |mig 'jug bstan pa thos gyur pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig dben
bstan pa thos pas na/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la skye med bstan thos pas//
mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig med bstan pa thos pas na/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs
par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig ni nyer zhi bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje
chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la bdag med bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul
bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la gang zag med thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems
can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la sems can med thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /
sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la srog med thos pas na/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong
snyed| |mig la gso ba med thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /'jig rten zhen pa
rab smad de/ /zhen pa mi bskyed nyid du mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /'jig rten rnyed pa rab smad de/ /'dus ma byas kyi
bsngags brjod mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /zag bcas shes pa rab smad de/ /zag med shes rab bsngags pa mdzad/ /
thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /'jig rten bsam gtan rab smad de/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin bsngags/ /thugs rje chen
pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /zag bcas tshul khrims rab smad de/ /zag med bslab nas bsngags par mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul
bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /sems rgya chung du'i skyon brjod de/ /sems rgya chen po'i yon tan bsngags/ /thugs rje chen po'i 'phrul bstan nas/ /lus kyi tshul khrims
sems shes rab/ /zag med brten pa med pa yi/ /bsngags pa dag ni brjod par mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam bsngags shing / /spros
la dga' zhing zhen pa dag /sangs rgyas smad pa rab tu bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /mig zad skyon ni rab 'byed cing / /rab zhi mtshan
nyid bstan par mdzad/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan
nas| |sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /dar la bab cing gzhon pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams
la rgya cher ni/ /cho rigs dag ni snyems pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /longs spyod
bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /rang dbang bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes
dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /gzugs kyis bag med gyur
pa la| |nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /bud med bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs
dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /gos kyi bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par
bstan| |thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /chang gis bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje
chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /rgyal po bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul
bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /tshul khrims snyems par gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//
sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /shes rab snyems par gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /de bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul dang / /bsam gtan
mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang / /nor dang bshad dang rigs dang 'khor/ /rol mo glu dang lce rgyad dang / /grags ba phun tshogs bsngags pa dang / /bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa dang / mdzes dang
g.yo sgyu nga rgyal dang / /ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang / /khengs dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang / /bag med 'dod chags de bzhin no/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems
can gang zhig sems dang yid/ /dman par gyur pa de dag la/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can gang zhig rab
zhum zhing / /rtsol bar mi byed de dag la/ /brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can gang zhig nor rnams la/ /chags
par gyur pa de dag la/ /chog shes chos ni ston par mdzad/ /gzhan yang sbos kyi dri gtsang khang / /me tog dag gi gzhal med khang / /khang pa brtsegs ma mchog sprul nas/ /
sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan/ /gzhan yang lha yi bu mo rnams/ /me tog tsam+pa'i khang pa na/ /gnas pa'i lus phyed bstan sprul nas/ /me tog phreng thogs mchod
byed bstan/ /gzhan yang lha min bu mo dag /me tog ma la'i khang pa na/ /gnas pa'i lus phyed bstan sprul nas/ /me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan/ /gzhan yang lha yi bu
mo rnams/ /pad+ma sngon po'i khang pa na/ /gnas pa'i lus phyed bstan 'phrul nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa bstan/ /gzhan yang tshangs
pa rnams kyi lha/ /gser gyi gzhal med khang pa na/ /gnas pa'i lus kun bstan bsdus nas/ /sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan/ /gzhan yang lha yi bu mo dag /sna tshogs
rgyan gyis lus brgyan zhing / /rgyan ni phan tshun reg pa las/ /sgra snyan dag ni rab byung nas/ /'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag ni/ /'gyur zhing mi brtan yin na yang / /byis pa
mi bden rtogs pa yis/ /yang dag ji bzhin mi shes zer/ /rgyan gyi sgra ni de dag kyang / /lus dang sems las byung ma yin/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/ /phyogs kyang
yod pa ma yin te/ /gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /byis pa rnams ni mi shes pas/ /'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyan gyi rnam
pa de dag las/ /sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing kun grags pas na/ /sems can tshad med grol bar 'gyur/ /de lta bas na khyed rnams kyis/ /'dren pa
dang byung ye shes dang / /yon tan dpag med sku dag ni/ /sred pa'i spros las 'das pa dang / /rab dben skyon ni med pa dang / /lta bral sems ni rab sbyangs dang / /mtshan
dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang / /sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos/ /khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegs tshe/ /gom pa dag ni seng+ge 'dra/ /gshegs stangs ngang pa glang chen 'dra/ /sems
can re ba skong bar mdzad/ /bsod nams khyad 'phags yongs su rdzogs/ /yang dag mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kun/ /blta bas mi ngoms nyid du
ltos| |khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni/ /thugs rje chen po ldan pas na/ /dngos po chung dus mchod byas kyang / /yon tan tshad med thob mdzad pas/ /sems can dag ni mang
po rnams/ /bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob bar du/ /rnam smin thug pa med par ltos/ /khyed kyi rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni/ /zag med tshul khrims rdzog
pas na| |sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ /gus pas spyi bos phyag byed dang / /lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams/ /so sor gzhal med khang spangs nas/ /rtse ba dag la chags med
par| |'dren pa la ni rton byed ltos/ /khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor/ /bcom ldan 'das la dad bskyed nas/ /gser gyi rlung yab dag thogs te/ /g.yas g.yon du ni 'khod
pa dang / /bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis/ /lha yi me tog yid 'ong bas/ /de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas/ /bla med ye shes tshol la ltos/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
la ni| |bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na/ /deng ni bcom ldan phrad gyur nas/ /so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin/ /spobs pa dag ni tshad med kyis/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu/ /sred pa spangs pa zhes bya ba/ /thog mar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas/ /mig zad mtha' ni shes par
gyur| |mig gi skye mtha' shes pas na/ /rab zhi'i mtshan nyid bar du rtogs/ /gzhan yang mig la sogs pa yi/ /ming don tshig ni dpag med rtogs/ /des ni tshig mkhas dag
gis ni| |sems can rnams la yang dag bstan/ /ming dang don rnams la yang ni/ /zhen pa the tshom med pas na/ /'gro 'ong med par rab rtogs shing / /blang dor med pa nyid du
gyur| |rang bzhin dag ni stong dben pas/ /yi ge rnams ni spangs pa dang / /len dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang / /kha ton 'don cing sgrub med rtogs/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams/ /sngon yang rab tu phye ste bstan/ /btags pa'i ming tsam yin pas na/ /yang dag brjod du ci yang med/ /rang bzhin stong pa de dag ni/ /phung po khams dang skye
mched 'das/ /rdzun pa med cing bden pa'ang med/ /gnas dang gnas pa yod ma yin/ /tshig gi smra ba'i lam chad cing / /sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi/ /skye bo mtshan
ma med pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs par mthong / /bcom ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang / /byis pa yang dag ma yin rtog /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i
tshe| |gang zhig dga' ba skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni mtshan mar rtog pa ste/ /mya ngan gdung dang bcas par 'gyur/ /gang gi mtshan ma'i rtog spangs pa/ /grong khyer gshegs pa mthong mi
'gyur| |gshegs shing bskyod pa'i mtshan ma la/ /rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab thob/ /gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong / /des ni grong khyer gshegs pa mthong / /skye zhing 'khor
pa'i chos dag la/ /rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed/ /gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong / /dga' ba dang ni skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni bdud kyi spyod la gnas/ /bdud kyi spyod yul
snang ba yin/ /gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthod/ /de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin/ /de ni mya ngan gdung bcas pas/ /mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin/ /chos la thob par
gang lta ba/ /de la chos stor mya ngan yod/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sdug bsngal yod/ /bskal pa mang por gang bsgoms pas/ /mtshan ma thams cad
rtogs nas ni/ /grong khyer gshegs pa mi rtog cing / /mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid stong rtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod la gnas pas na/ /grong khyer
gshegs par mi rtog cing / /mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med/ /gang gis de ltar rab shes pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing / /ngo bo nyid
kyang stong rtogs pas/ /mthar ni skye 'gag ci yang med/ /bcom ldan bskal pa dpag med nas/ /dka' ba rnams ni rab spyad nas/ /ngo bo nyid ni stong mkhyen na/ /byis pa rnams
kyis mi rtogs so/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /'khor ni brgya stong mang pos bskor/ /mi dang mi ma yin la sogs/ /dang ba'i sems kyis mchod pa bas/ /gang
gis skad cig tsam du ni/ /mig zad mthar ni rab sems shing / /mtshan ma rnams ni stong rtogs na/ /'di yi bsod nams de bas 'phags/ /bgrang ba dang ni grangs kyi cha/ /
rgyu tsam du yang mi bzod do/ /de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dang / /mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni reg par bya/ /rna ba sna lce lus
dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe//
zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis/ /sa ni kun tu rab tu g.yos/ /ri rnams gang yin de dag kyang / /thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phyogs/ /lha mi dag ni chos kyi phyir/ /thams
cad 'ong nas gus mchod byas/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /lha yi dbang po mi yi rgyal/ /lha ma yin ni mang po dang / /gnod sbyin dag ni mang
po rnams/ /rang gi grong khyer spangs nas ni/ /bcom ldan spyan sngar 'dus gyur te/ /rab tu dga' bas mchod pa byas/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs
pa'i tshe| |gzhan yang rnam pa tha dad pa'i/ /bya yi tshogs ni tshad med pa/ /ne tso dang ni rma bya dang / /ka la ping+ka bya yi rnams/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /yon tan mchog
ni mthong bas na/ /thams cad nam mkha' dag la ni/ /rab tu dga' bas rnam par rtse/ /thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sgra snyan dag ni rab tu phyung / /de nas de tshe bcom
ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang / /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis/ /sems can tshad med brgya stong snyed/ /long ba
dag ni mthong bar gyur/ /'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur/ /dbang po ma tshang gang yin pa/ /thams cad dbang po tshang bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal la ni gnas pa dag /thams
cad bde ba thob par gyur/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/ /'di skad smra ba thos par gyur/ /gang gis
mtshan ma rnams kyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtog byed pa/ /de yis bcom ldan 'das la ni/ /mchod pa byas zhes brjod mi bya/ /mig zad
mtha' yi ngo bo nyid/ /rtogs par yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma rnams ni gang spangs pa/ /yon tan gzhi ni bsags pas na/ /mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid/ /rab tu
rtogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar mig ni zad pa'i mtha'/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang / /rab tu rtogs par khong du chud//
mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag la/ /mi 'dzin sbed pa med pa dang / /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/ /brten cing gnas pa med pa dang / /mig ni rab tu dben pa la/ /g.yo ba'i
bsam pa med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / /mig gi
mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /de la yid kyis rtog med dang / /mig ni rnam par 'jig pa la/ /bstan par bya ba med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba
nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /mig ni med par gyur pa la/ /mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / /mig ni skye ba med pa la/ /yongs su sdud pa med pa dang / /mig ni rab tu zhi ba la//
'dzin pa dag ni med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig ni zad pa med pa'i phyir/ /mtshan rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang / /mig gi mtha' ni
shes pa'i phyir/ /dbang po dag ni nges gyur dang / /mig ni skye ba shes pa'i phyir/ /dbang po rang dbang thob gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du
gyur pa yin/ /mig ni med par rtogs gyur nas/ /gzugs ni khong du chud pa dang / /mig ni 'jig par rab shes nas/ /chos la so sor rtog pa da dang / /mig ni skye med shes gyur
nas| |lam ni sgrub par gang byed pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig zad mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir//
las kyi bye brag tha dad pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /las kyi bye brag tha dad pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid
du gyur pa yin/ /mig skye mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal bye brag
tha dad pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig gi 'jig pa gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin
rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig gi med pa gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /mtshan ma spangs
pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid
du gyur pa yin/ /mig gi skye med gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /bag chags
spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /gzhan yang mig gi mi rtog nyid/ /
yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir//
des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /gzhan yang mig la yi ge med/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas ye shes stobs
dag kyang / /rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag ni/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur
pa yin| |gzhan yang mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /'dod rnams spangs pa gang
yin pa| |rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /gzhan yang bsam gtan sgom pa dag /yang dag ji bzhin
rtogs pa'i phyir/ /nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /gang zag des ni de bzhin du/ /mig gi mngon mtha' shes pa dang / /mig gi mi gnas shes pa dang / /mig ni skye ba shes
pa dang / /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang / /mig gi dman pa shes pa dang / /mig ni khyad par 'phags shes dang / /ye shes dman pa shes pa dang / /rnam dag ye shes shes
pa dang / /tshul khrims rnam dag shes pa dang / /lus kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang / /ngag gi sdom pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag sems kyi shes
pa dang / /gnas kyi bye brag shes pa dang / /sems kyi chos kyi shes pa dang / /sems skyon shes pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag las kyi shes pa dang /
sems kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang / /nyes dmigs shes pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang / /phung po'i bye brag shes pa dang / /phung po'i rgyu rkyen shes pa dang / /mig
ni yongs shes shes pa dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung gnas shes pa dang / /zag med tshul khrims shes pa dang / /tshul khrims rgyu rkyen shes pa dang / /sdug bsngal rgyu rkyen shes pa
dang / /sdug bsngal zad pa'i rgyu shes dang / /'dus byas rnams kyi shes pa dang / /zag pa zad pa'i shes pa dang / /yongs su rdzogs par shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang rgyu rkyen
bcu gnyis kyi/ /spyod dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang / /spyod pa med pa'i shes pa dang / /mtshan ma dang bcas mtshan ma med/ /'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas/ /rnam par gzhag
dang yongs sdud dang / /bdag dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang mig zad skye mtha' dang / /mig gi mtha' dang rab dben dang / /
'jug pa dang ni med pa dang / /mi skye ba dang nyer zhi nyid/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na/ /sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ /rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang / /mthu dang
bcas pa'i ye shes dang / /brtson 'grus ye shes thob par byed/ /gzhan yang gcig dang tha dad shes/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /mos pa'i shes pa gang yin pa/ /yang
dag de bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi/ /mos pa khyad par 'phags pa dang / /rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang / /las dang rnam smin shes pa dang / /
